info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Schenectady, northeastern Albany, south central Saratoga and western Rensselaer Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 641 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Clifton Park, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Albany, Schenectady, Troy, Clifton Park, East Greenbush, Cohoes, Watervliet, Rensselaer, Colonie, Latham, Niskayuna, Menands, Green Island, Waterford, Loudonville, Country Knolls, West Sand Lake, Center Brunswick, Wyantskill and Averill Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 5. Interstate 87 between exits 4 and 7, and between exits 8A and 10. Interstate 787 between exits 3 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
